Welcome

August 5, 2013

Welcome to Haikus in C, the programming blog of Ian and Ruchir, two CS students at Columbia.

We wanted a place to share code, work on tough problems, and talk about our solutions so we built this place. Check out the github page to see all the code in its entirety.
